author: glennm
msg: Glenn McAllister - 2002/07/25
- BaseObject.getId no longer returns new id numbers every time it is called for
the same object.
- Removed duplicate dependency in the reactor plugin to the maven project.  The
duplicate was causing an empty <dependency /> element to be written out
during the Jelly interpolation stage, which created the "blank" dependency
when it was reparsed by betwixt, which we would see as a failure to download
dependency ##-null.jar.
- Project.addDependency will now add only unique dependencies to prevent this
problem from occuring again.

author: glennm
msg: Glenn McAllister - 2002/07/25
- since maven.repo.remote is defined in driver.properties, we don't need to
progrmatically add it in Maven.java (thx to Jason for pointing that out).

author: glennm
msg: Glenn McAllister - 2002/07/25
- fixed the '//' url name problem when downloading dependencies
- maven.repo.remote can now be set in one of the standard properties files; if
it isn't found, defaults to http://jakarta.apache.org/turbin/jars2/
- starting to debug the 74-null.jar style errors, looks like a bad dependency
is being added to the project.
